page.title: 12HEALTH IN RESCOBIE
page.content: {Health}in Rescobie is mostly in the hands of the District Nurse who cares for the ill,the terminally ill and those who would otherwise go to hospital. She also does{Midwifery}but very few babies are born at home (instead they are born at Ninewells)so she usually visits mum and baby after they come home. On average she has 36 patients,mostly elderly,who are referred to her by G.P.s. The amount of visits a patient gets depends on what is wrong with them. She works a 37.5 hr. week from 8-5 and is on duty 1 in 4 weekends. The District Nurse also does{Emergencies}and carries a medical pack in her car.{Problems}for her are wounds not healing, long term illness, not being able to reach patients in bad weather (in cases like this Police helicopters are needed) and finally patient acceptance.
